description: Manage and inspect the state of services

action.description: The operation (start, stop, restart, enable, disable, status) to perform on the service
action.type: Enum[start, stop, restart, enable, disable, status]

name.description: The name of the service to operate on.

provider.description: The provider to use to manage or inspect the service, defaults to the system service manager

use_catalog.description: Whether to use a custom start, stop, status, or restart command, if it exists, from the current cached catalog
